_source.short_desc: Submit.com's feature-rich yet easy-to-use secure online platform delivers organisations one seamless grant management solution.
_source.long_desc:
Submit.com's Grant Management Software is the most flexible on the market that will adapt to your current grants management process and grow and expand with you.

Feature-rich yet easy-to-use secure online platform delivers organizations one seamless Grant Management solution for the entire grants lifecycle. 

Create and personalize applications, manage all of the back-end administration and review, and take care of reporting, process, and impact, all from one location.
_source.pricing_details: Find the perfect plan for your organization and only pay for the features you need.
_source.target_audience:
Grant Management
Scholarships
Contests and Competitions
Innovation
Auditions/Casting
API & Integrations
Granular Team Permissions
Multiphase Submissions
Workflow Management Software

category_features.name: Compliance Management
category_features.definition: Track and manage non-adherence to policies in a service, product, process, or supplier behavior

category_features.name: Contract/License Management
category_features.definition: Track, store, and access client/customer contracts

category_features.name: Grant Application Management
category_features.definition: Track and manage the status of grants throughout the application lifecyle

category_features.name: Grant Award Tracking
category_features.definition: Track grant submission requirements, deadlines, and financial documentation for awarded grants

category_features.name: Grant Discovery
category_features.definition: Automatically search funding sources and alert uses when grant opportunities arise

category_features.name: Compliance Management
category_features.definition: Track and manage non-adherence to policies in a service, product, process, or supplier behavior

category_features.name: Inventory Management
category_features.definition: Track and manage the quantity of resources on hand to maintain proper supply

category_features.name: Self Service Portal
category_features.definition: Gateway through which end users can access the system

category_features.name: Access Controls/Permissions
category_features.definition: Define levels of authorization for access to specific files/folders

category_features.name: Business Process Automation
category_features.definition: Improve the management of information, tasks, and procedures by establishing routines and patterns associated with processes

category_features.name: Calendar Management
category_features.definition: Create, manage, and share muliple calendars

category_features.name: Compliance Tracking
category_features.definition: Track business operations to ensure they are performed correctly and according to industry regulations

category_features.name: Customizable Dashboard
category_features.definition: Alter the layout and content of dashboards

category_features.name: Document Management
category_features.definition: Collect, upload, store, and share all documents in a centralized location making it easier for everyone involved to access information

category_features.name: Forms Management
category_features.definition: Organize, store and distribute forms and form templates in a centralized location

category_features.name: Graphical Workflow Editor
category_features.definition: Create, design and modify the flow and processes of tasks in a project

category_features.name: Mobile Access
category_features.definition: Access the software remotely via mobile devices

category_features.name: No-Code
category_features.definition: Drag and drop/visual interfaces that allow non-tech users to build without writing code

category_features.name: Task Management
category_features.definition: A running list of action items and their respective status

category_features.name: Third Party Integrations
category_features.definition: Improve business process by accessing more features and applications by combining third party integrations

category_features.name: Workflow Configuration
category_features.definition: Alter the default workflow to meet your organization's needs

related_products.short_desc: Apply empowers organizations to seamlessly collect, manage and review grant applications and drive better, faster funding decisions.
related_products.features: Move towards your mission, faster. Create a frictionless grantmaking process with SurveyMonkey Apply (formerly known as FluidReview). Seamlessly collect and review applications online, save time with robust automations, gain insights with powerful reports, and more. Special non-profit pricing is available.

related_products.short_desc: Streamline financial processes and demonstrate accountability with Blackbaud Financial Edge NXT's complete fund accounting system.
related_products.features: Blackbaud Financial Edge NXT delivers unparalleled cloud-based financial management capabilities to keep you compliant with grant reporting standards while helping you streamline your operations. With Financial Edge NXT, capture and monitor grant activity and financials while demonstrating accountability to increase grant renewals. Ensure funds are properly allocated, track and report financial activity from any device with 24/7 accessibility.

related_products.short_desc: SmarterSelect provides a comprehensive, yet easy-to-use, online application management solution for scholarships, grants, awards, etc.
related_products.features: With an over 95% customer retention rate and over 98% customer satisfaction rate, SmarterSelect provides a comprehensive, yet easy-to-use, online application management solution for scholarships, grants, awards, fellowships, data collection, etc.  Create, collect, analyze, and evaluate applications using our mobile-responsive user interface, text message notifications, inline calculations, dynamic application rules, online recommendations, file uploads, and much, much more.

related_products.short_desc: Grants Network modernizes grants management for state, local and tribal governments through SaaS technology.
related_products.features: Grants Network is modernizing grants management for state, local, and tribal governments. The system provides a unified process and portal to search for, track, and administer funding across entire local or state jurisdictions. Whether youre managing an award or a recipient, Grants Network simplifies the entire process and streamlines communication. Grantors can create and track grant solicitations while grantees can track and report on projects all in one centralized system.

related_products.short_desc: Launch, manage, measure, and grow your grants and social impact programs with Submittable's intuitive, flexible cloud-based platform.
related_products.features: Submittable powers you with tools to launch, measure, and grow your social impact programs, locally and globally. From grants and corporate social responsibility programs to awards and scholarships. The start-to-finish platform makes your workflow smarter and more efficient, leading to better decisions and bigger impact. Easily report on success, and learn for the future-Submittable is flexible and powerful enough to grow alongside your programs.

related_products.short_desc: The most flexible and configurable platform for full-cycle program management, supporting grantmakers at mission-based organizations.
related_products.features: Informed, effective, and equitable grantmaking requires more than cookie-cutter software. Zengine by WizeHive is the most flexible solution for grantmakers, providing full lifecycle solutions, tailored workflows, engaging experiences, and invaluable impact analysis and reporting dashboards. Integrates with GuideStar, Salesforce, and 2000+ other systems. Powering some of the world's most heroic missions, including those of leading foundations, CSR programs, universities, and government programs.

related_products.short_desc: Cultivate strong funder relationships and track deadlines, deliverables, and revenue through the grant lifecycle with EveryAction.
related_products.features: Utilize modern, state-of-the-art workflows to identify and research prospective funders, track deadlines and documents throughout the grant lifecycle, and analyze results. EveryAction's powerful, unified nonprofit CRM enables nonprofits of all sizes to cultivate strong funder relationships and easily track communications, deliverables, and revenue throughout the grant process. Built and supported by nonprofit fundraisers, EveryAction is built to increase efficiency and help you raise more money.

related_products.short_desc: Manage your entire nonprofit with a single CRM! Get all the functionality you need, plus donation webpages & build-in email marketing.
related_products.features:
Manage your entire nonprofit with a single CRM! Choose the Add-on options you need, including Memberships, Case Management, Grant Management and more to create a solution tailored for your exact needs.

Sumac also offers donation webpages, build-in  email marketing tools, and it integrates with your accounting software.

If you manage unique programs and services, Sumac has a Custom Add-on that we'll configure to meet your exact needs,

related_products.short_desc: Track incoming and outgoing grants, stay on top of reporting requirements, and manage the entire grant cycle.
related_products.features: If you are a grant-making or grant-seeking organization, you need to track and manage a myriad of detailed information throughout the grant process. Exceed Beyond ensures that all aspects of the process are thoroughly accounted for and on schedule. Our Grant Management application empowers you to save time, be more productive, and get exceptional value while streamlining the grant process.

related_products.short_desc: A single cloud-based solution designed for financial planning, expense management, accounting, and transactions.
related_products.features: Workday Financial Management is a single cloud-based financial planning, accounting, and transactions solution. By combining transactions, accounting, analytics, and always-on audit in one system, Workday empowers decision-makers with in-the-moment and on-the-go financial and business insight they can act upon and plan for what's next.

related_products.short_desc: GrantHub for Grantseekers is a grant management solution designed to save you time while increasing your grant funding success
related_products.features: GrantHub for Grantseekers helps you find funders and grants, as well as track and organize all your deadlines, applications, reports, and important grant documents. Instead of using a mix of manual methods and tools (spreadsheets, task manager, calendar, file storage systems. etc.) GrantHub will streamline the creation of your application and proactively send out email reminders when deadlines are coming due. Grant consultants can also use GrantHub to track grants for multiple clients.

similar_products.short_desc: Launch, manage, measure, and grow your grants and social impact programs with Submittable's intuitive, flexible cloud-based platform.
similar_products.features: Submittable powers you with tools to launch, measure, and grow your social impact programs, locally and globally. From grants and corporate social responsibility programs to awards and scholarships. The start-to-finish platform makes your workflow smarter and more efficient, leading to better decisions and bigger impact. Easily report on success, and learn for the future-Submittable is flexible and powerful enough to grow alongside your programs.

similar_products.short_desc: The most flexible and configurable platform for full-cycle program management, supporting grantmakers at mission-based organizations.
similar_products.features: Informed, effective, and equitable grantmaking requires more than cookie-cutter software. Zengine by WizeHive is the most flexible solution for grantmakers, providing full lifecycle solutions, tailored workflows, engaging experiences, and invaluable impact analysis and reporting dashboards. Integrates with GuideStar, Salesforce, and 2000+ other systems. Powering some of the world's most heroic missions, including those of leading foundations, CSR programs, universities, and government programs.

similar_products.short_desc: Grant Management Software to Help You Achieve Your Mission. Maximize Outcomes. Meet Performance Standards. Increase Compliance.
similar_products.features: AmpliFund is the leading purpose-built grant management platform designed for organizations ranging from government entities to nonprofits, to educational institutions to manage every phase of the grant management process. Our configurable solution provides a full suite of features needed by grant funders and recipients to maximize grant outcomes, meet performance standards, increase compliance, and achieve their missions.

similar_products.short_desc: Fluxx Grantmaker makes grantmaking and impact reporting easy. Request a demo today.
similar_products.features: Fluxx Grantmaker provides the most complete set of features designed solely for grantmaking - collaboration tools, budgeting and forecasting, grantee engagement, reporting, storytelling, and more - out of the box as part of the base solution. Grantmaker enables data-driven grantmaking via a cloud-based, mobile-optimized platform. Powered by the Fluxx Data CoreTM, Grantmaker fosters collaboration, knowledge transfer, and continuous learning that drives impact for funders and their grantees.

similar_products.short_desc: Foundant GLM is a powerful online grantmaking solution, with an intuitive platform, and guaranteed dedication to clients success.
similar_products.features: Foundant Technologies leads the industry in solutions tailored specifically to support philanthropy. More than 1500 grantmakers use Grant Lifecycle Manager (GLM) - an intuitive platform suitable for users at any technological level. Specializing exclusively in the philanthropic sector, Foundant has dialed in what it means to provide exceptional customer service and support with Client Success Managers dedicated to and trained in client success.

similar_products.short_desc: Fully customizable, all-in-one cloud-based grant management platform to launch, manage, measure, impact report and grow.
similar_products.features: CommunityForce Grant Management Software is the philanthropy industry's leading cloud-based all in one grants platform, enabling users to prospect, collaborate, report and analyze in real time. Integrations with Salesforce and 100+ other systems, powering some of the world's most heroic missions, including those of leading foundations, CSR programs, universities, and government programs, with data-driven grantmaking. Join the 100+ non profits using the best in class grants management software!

similar_products.short_desc: Powerful fundraising and supporter management tools which help you work more efficiently and bring in more money for your mission.
similar_products.features: With Blackbaud Grantmaking, benefit from an open grantmaking software platform that integrates with your other business solutions while still providing an intuitive user experience. Sign in from any device, anywhere, on any browser, making it easy for staff to manage the grants workflow or share important grant management information anytime. Effortlessly setup online application forms for review from anywhere for faster approval. See how Blackbaud can add value to your organization.

similar_products.short_desc: The Optimy grant management solution coordinates all of your applications in one place in a concise and easy-to-view dashboard.
similar_products.features: Mission-driven companies deserve a customer-focused solution to manage grants across all stages of the life cycle. Optimy's grant management software enables you to receive and select grants applications to better serve the ones you are trying to help and at the same time to manage and report on your impact to those who offer their support. With Optimy, you get a personalised service, we believe in human interaction and put it in the centre of our work.

similar_products.short_desc: Good Grants is a grantmaking platform that helps grantmakers around the world affordably accept, manage and fund grant applications.
similar_products.features:
Good Grants is an internationalised grantmaking platform that helps small to medium-sized grantmakers around the world affordably accept, manage and fund good grant applications, their way.

Designed for grantmakers who have outgrown manual processes and spreadsheet program management, Good Grants offers an attractive alternative to overpriced grantmaking software. 

Good Grants empowers grantmakers to manage the entire grant lifecycle, streamline processes and optimise funding, online.

similar_products.short_desc: GrantHub for Grantseekers is a grant management solution designed to save you time while increasing your grant funding success
similar_products.features: GrantHub for Grantseekers helps you find funders and grants, as well as track and organize all your deadlines, applications, reports, and important grant documents. Instead of using a mix of manual methods and tools (spreadsheets, task manager, calendar, file storage systems. etc.) GrantHub will streamline the creation of your application and proactively send out email reminders when deadlines are coming due. Grant consultants can also use GrantHub to track grants for multiple clients.

similar_products.short_desc: SmarterSelect provides a comprehensive, yet easy-to-use, online application management solution for scholarships, grants, awards, etc.
similar_products.features: With an over 95% customer retention rate and over 98% customer satisfaction rate, SmarterSelect provides a comprehensive, yet easy-to-use, online application management solution for scholarships, grants, awards, fellowships, data collection, etc.  Create, collect, analyze, and evaluate applications using our mobile-responsive user interface, text message notifications, inline calculations, dynamic application rules, online recommendations, file uploads, and much, much more.

similar_products.short_desc: InfoStrat's Grants Manager Plus is a Microsoft Dynamics 365-powered grant management solution that simplifies the entire grant process.
similar_products.features: InfoStrat's Grants Manager Plus provides grantors with an all-in-one, integrated solution that simplifies the grants process from initial solicitation through review, scoring, award, payment processing and post award reporting.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Fund Accounting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Fund Accounting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Fund Accounting software automates accounting and portfolio management functions for nonprofit organizations, alternative asset managers, private bankers, foundations and government agencies. Fund administrators utilize these applications to assist in strategic decision making and to increase accountability across an organization's financial operations. Fund Accounting software also assists with regulatory compliance management and financial reporting on portfolio performance. Fund Accounting software is related to Accounting software and Government software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Fundraising software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Fundraising tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Fundraising software manages donor and pledge information associated with fundraising campaigns. Development professionals use Fundraising applications to enhance their ability to locate, manage and grow donor sources. Fundraising software facilitates cost effective targeting of likely donors, tracks pledges, and manages contributions and donor relationship management. These applications also provide a variety of tools allowing fundraisers to track the effectiveness of their development campaigns. Fundraising software is related to Church Management software, Event Management software and Political Campaign software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Nonprofit software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Nonprofit tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Nonprofit software automates all aspects of nonprofit operations from database management, to fundraising, to accounting and CRM. Nonprofit software is related to Donation Management software and Nonprofit Accounting software.

supported_countries.name: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

_source.short_desc: Submit.com is a cloud-based software solution which streamlines the collection, management and evaluation of online survey submissions.
_source.long_desc:
Submit.com is a cloud-based software solution for streamlining the collection, management, and evaluation of any online survey submissions.

Submit.com is supremely powerful, endlessly versatile, super customizable, highly scalable, lightning-fast with enterprise-level security.

Submit.com can be used in a variety of situations but has provided solutions for leading organizations in; academia, awards, field operations, grant management, human resources, and TV talent casting.

category_features.name: Data Analysis Tools
category_features.definition: Analyze survey results via statistical testing or crosstabs directly within the software

category_features.name: Email Marketing
category_features.definition: Create and send email blasts/campaigns

category_features.name: Mobile Survey
category_features.definition: Distribute a survey via mobile devices

category_features.name: Offline Response Collection
category_features.definition: Allow participants to fill out and submit the survey without internet connection

category_features.name: Question Branching
category_features.definition: Show participants specific questions based on their answer to a previous question (ie. different paths)

category_features.name: Question Library
category_features.definition: Prepopulate common question/answer options

category_features.name: Site Intercept Survey
category_features.definition: Survey popup over a webpage to specific users based on their behavior

category_features.name: Skip Logic
category_features.definition: Avoid showing participants irrelevant questions as determined by the answer to a previous question

category_features.name: Support Audio/Images/Video
category_features.definition: Allow media to be embedded in the question or answer options

category_features.name: URL Customization
category_features.definition: Change the URL of your survey to fit your branding or survey title

category_features.name: Access Controls/Permissions
category_features.definition: Define levels of authorization for access to specific files/folders

category_features.name: Audit Trail
category_features.definition: Track changes and view date/time records

category_features.name: Authentication
category_features.definition: Determine/verify the signature (who signed it)

category_features.name: Customizable Templates
category_features.definition: Create, save, and repurpose formatting

category_features.name: Data Security
category_features.definition: Protect digital privacy and secure data

category_features.name: Document Analytics
category_features.definition: View statistics and metrics about a document on a dashboard or by exporting a file

category_features.name: Document Storage
category_features.definition: Store documents in a centralized location for easy access

category_features.name: Electronic Signature
category_features.definition: Sign a document within the system

category_features.name: Mobile Signature Capture
category_features.definition: Capture a signature via a mobile device

category_features.name: Multi-Party Signing
category_features.definition: Share documents to multiple users to collect multiple signatures in a serial, parallel or combination order.

category_features.name: Reminders
category_features.definition: Set notifications to remind users when to view and sign documents

category_features.name: Task Progress Tracking
category_features.definition: Measurement and reporting of task milestones

category_features.name: Interview Management
category_features.definition: Create and track interviews with a reminder system

related_products.short_desc: Mailchimp's all-in-one Marketing Platform helps small businesses market smarter so you can grow faster.
related_products.features: Mailchimp's all-in-one Marketing Platform helps small businesses market smarter so you can grow faster. As the backbone for your customer relationships, they provide AI-powered, user-friendly tools anyone can use to be successful. Mailchimp puts your audience at the center so you can send marketing emails and automated messages, create targeted ad campaigns, build landing pages, send postcards, facilitate reporting and analytics, and sell online.

related_products.short_desc: A market-leading survey platform.
related_products.features: Trusted by 98% of the Fortune 500 and used in more than 335,000 organizations worldwide, SurveyMonkey's platform gives millions of people a way to turn feedback into action that drives growth and innovation. Get access to expert-written survey templates that speak to customers, employees, or your target audience. Create simple to advanced surveys in minutes. Discover why SurveyMonkey is a leading survey platform around the globe!

related_products.short_desc: A market-leading survey platform.
related_products.features: Trusted by 98% of the Fortune 500 and used in more than 335,000 organizations worldwide, SurveyMonkey's platform gives millions of people a way to turn feedback into action that drives growth and innovation. Get access to expert-written survey templates that speak to customers, employees, or your target audience. Create simple to advanced surveys in minutes. Discover why SurveyMonkey is a leading survey platform around the globe!

related_products.short_desc: Motivosity is an employee engagement platform that helps people be more motivated at work.
related_products.features: Motivosity is a modern employee engagement software with the mission to make people happier at work. Our platform focuses on three of the top drivers of employee satisfaction: feeling appreciated for your work, being part of a community, and having a meaningful relationship with your manager. With an average 95% user engagement rate, our software drives amazing results by making consistent recognition a part of your culture and making visible all the great work your team members are doing.

related_products.short_desc: Get valuable feedback or conduct research online with Jotform's customizable, mobile-friendly surveys, questionnaires, and polls.
related_products.features: Whether you need to conduct market research or obtain valuable feedback for your business, Jotform makes it easier than ever to create powerful online surveys that get answers fast. Build engaging and easy-to-fill surveys, questionnaires, polls, and more without any coding. Save responses in a collaborative spreadsheet-powered database platform, or turn them into visual reports in just one click to better analyze and present results.

related_products.short_desc: An experience management platform for organizations of all sizes that seamlessly automates data collection and analysis.
related_products.features: Experience management platform by Sogolytics seamlessly automates data collection and analysis for organizations of all sizes. From designing and distributing a questionnaire to analysis and closing the loop, the platform does everything with ease and at a level of sophistication that is rare in the industry. Sogolytics is differentiated by its best-in-class, 24/7 customer support, deep analytics, industry-leading data security, and its ability to scale with organizations' growing needs.

related_products.short_desc: Create engaging, platform-independent and beautiful surveys. We empower companies - large & small - & individuals, to collect feedback.
related_products.features:
SurveyLegend is the next generation of online surveys engaging, platform-independent & beautiful. We empower companies - large & small - & individuals, to create mobile-friendly, gorgeous surveys.

Now you can create great-looking surveys on your PC or tablet, customize the look of your survey however you like, & display collected data with eye-catching & insightful graphics. Creating questionnaires is done simply by drag & drop, & you don't need to be a market research expert to use our tool.

related_products.short_desc: Collect more useful feedback with surveys that look and feel great. 120+ integrations to your favorite apps.
related_products.features: Get more insights and useful feedback using Typeform: over 1.5 million typeforms are submitted every single day. Why? Our forms look amazing (and are fully customizable to your brand), plus the smooth and responsive UI makes filling them in a pleasure. 120+ integrations to your favorite apps lets you send data automatically wherever you need it. Plus, it's quick and simple to make a typeform: get started with our easy form builder, and launch your survey in minutes.

related_products.short_desc: Birdeye Surveys is an easy-to-use product that turns customer feedback into revenue and is part of the Experience Marketing platform.
related_products.features:
Birdeye Surveys gives you an easy-to-use Survey Builder to build out surveys with advanced skip logic to
survey your customers, prospects, and employees. Survey Automation allows you to send out automated
survey requests, and ask for reviews [and referrals roadmap Q2] along with your survey. Set up email alerts
to notify specific locations/employees when survey responses come in. Survey Insights analyzes customer
feedback at scale using Athena, a Natural Language Processing engine.

related_products.short_desc: Bring the voice of the customer to your decision-making with on-site and external Surveys from Hotjar!
related_products.features:
Bring the voice of the customer to your decision-making with on-site and external Surveys from Hotjar.
Hotjar Surveys allow you to ask your site visitors an unlimited number of questions, from an unlimited number of respondents. On-site surveys appear as pop-up widgets on your webpage(s), and external link surveys appear as stand-alone pages with their own designated web address (URL). Use our pre-built templates or create your own.

related_products.short_desc: Online survey tool that lets you create unlimited surveys, distribute them and analyze the data  with ease.
related_products.features:
Zoho Survey is easy-to-use online survey and questionnaire building software. Our features are scalable to suit yourneeds, with everything essential to create surveys, distribute them, and analyze responses.Survey panels are also available, if you needdata from specific demographics.
Informed decisions are just around the corner.Learn more about Zoho Survey at https://www.zoho.com/survey/.

similar_products.short_desc: WorkTango enables companies to give their employees a voice and easily collect feedback for any purpose to support actionable insight.
similar_products.features:
The WorkTango platform creates a space for employees to have a voice and helps companies easily gather frequent feedback for any engagement, transformation, or feedback initiative. 

Using data science and natural language understanding, actionable insights from employee feedback are served in real-time to Human Resources, C-Suite executives, and people leaders. 

The results are quicker insight, better people actionable decisions, and a more aligned and engaged workforce.

similar_products.short_desc: Alchemer Survey Software gives everyone in your organization powerful, easy-to-use survey software and no per-response fees.
similar_products.features: Alchemer Survey Software gives everyone in your organization powerful, easy-to-use survey and customer feedback software that's flexible enough for each team to use it their way, while still giving IT full security control and insight. Alchemer won Fastest Implementation, Easiest Setup, and Best Meets Requirements from users at G2.com. Get the feedback you need with the most question types and no per-response fees.

similar_products.short_desc: An experience management platform for organizations of all sizes that seamlessly automates data collection and analysis.
similar_products.features: Experience management platform by Sogolytics seamlessly automates data collection and analysis for organizations of all sizes. From designing and distributing a questionnaire to analysis and closing the loop, the platform does everything with ease and at a level of sophistication that is rare in the industry. Sogolytics is differentiated by its best-in-class, 24/7 customer support, deep analytics, industry-leading data security, and its ability to scale with organizations' growing needs.

similar_products.short_desc: GetFeedback is the #1-rated feedback solution for Salesforce. Seamlessly connect all of your CX surveys for actionable insight.
similar_products.features: With GetFeedback for Salesforce, you can automatically collect customer feedback at critical touchpoints in the customer journey. Pull more context into your surveys then push feedback into Salesforce so you can measure valuable customer metrics like NPS, CSAT, or CES and take intelligent action to improve your customer experience. GetFeedback customers see a 240% increase in response rates and 7x faster implementation than other cx survey platforms.

similar_products.short_desc: Tremendous is the best platform to offer rewards and incentives to survey participants.
similar_products.features: Tremendous is the ultimate platform to maximize survey participation at a global scale. Incentivize survey takers with instant digital rewards, including gift cards, prepaid Visa? cards, cash and more. Buy, track and manage survey incentives individually and in bulk via the Tremendous platform, or automatically by integrating with our API.

similar_products.short_desc: Coach, motivate, and empower your employees to make every customer experience awesome.
similar_products.features:
Get more repeat purchases and referrals by improving your customers' experiences. Collect real-time customer feedback to motivate, engage, and coach your service providers so they can deliver exceptional customer experiences, every time. 

Discover why AskNicely is the leading Customer Experience Management solution. Learn more at asknicely.com.

similar_products.short_desc: Momentive combines people-centric solutions with an agile AI-powered platform to reshape your customer experience.
similar_products.features: Momentive combines people-centric solutions with an agile, AI-powered platform to give every decision-maker in your organization the power to reshape your customer experience, your product, or your industry. Leveraging 20 plus years of expertise and over 55 billion responses by 6 billion respondents, Momentive is powered by real human inputs, based on proven best practices and delivers exceptional user experience. Trusted by over 98% of Fortune 500 companies.

similar_products.short_desc: HappyOrNot is a customer feedback insights solution that helps companies improve operational excellence and business performance.
similar_products.features:
HappyOrNot is a customer feedback insights solution that helps companies improve operational excellence and business performance, instantly and over time.

Our range of easy-to-use feedback-collecting Smileys, analytics, and reporting helps companies make informed decisions based on real-time, continuous data. Know how you're doing, what works (and what doesn't), and when and where to improve.

Additional Success services included, such as onboarding, customer support, Help Center, and more.

similar_products.short_desc: Mobile and cloud-based market research solution for businesses that helps collect, share and collaborate over research-based data.
similar_products.features: SurveyMonkey Enterprise empowers businesses to capture and act on critical feedback to drive growth and innovation at scale with advanced security and compliance features. Integrate survey feedback with your technology stack to enrich decision-making and automate workflows. SurveyMonkey's products, enterprise solutions, and integrations enable more than 335,000 organizations to deliver better customer experiences, increase employee retention, and unlock growth and innovation.

similar_products.short_desc: Uncover the hidden drivers of engagement & measure the pulse of your company culture with Leapsome?s employee engagement surveys.
similar_products.features:
With Leapsome you can run engagement surveys, pulse surveys, and collect eNPS to gather meaningful feedback and insights from employees. With the powerful survey analytics you can understand the engagement drivers that impact performance levels and employee churn so you can develop and retain your team.

Furthermore, Leapsome is an all-in-one people management platform used by CEOs and HR teams to not only drive employee engagement but also performance and learning as well.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top 360 Degree Feedback software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of 360 Degree Feedback tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: 360 Degree Feedback software is designed to help human resource departments gather all-around information about an employee. Unlike performance assessment software, 360 Degree Feedback applications allow organizations to collect information not only from superiors but also from peers and subordinates, as well as clients. The information collected can be used either for assessment or training purposes. 360 Degree Feedback software is related to Performance Appraisal software, Survey software and Human Resource software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Customer Experience software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Customer Experience tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Customer Experience software (also known as CXM or CEM) helps to collect, organize and track customer feedback. This software includes a variety of applications for collecting customer opinions to tools for converting text-based feedback into numeric information that can later be used for marketing purposes. Customer Experience software is related to Survey software, Customer Satisfaction software and Customer Loyalty software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Employee Recognition software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Employee Recognition tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Employee Recognition solutions assist with keeping employees feeling engaged and appreciated at work. This software facilitates peer recognition on corporate and team discussion boards, administration of awards and loyalty programs, as well as extensive reporting and analytics. Employee Recognition software is related to HR software and Talent Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top IVR software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of IVR tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Interactive Voice Response (IVR) software, allows call centers, help desks and other organizations to create menus which the caller can navigate using spoken commands or their telephone keys. IVR software is mainly used for systems that allow callers to select information or enter data without the need for assistance. IVR systems can also be used to route callers to the appropriate department within an organization, based on their answers to qualifying questions.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Market Research software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Market Research tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Market Research software helps researchers effectively recruit, survey and maintain panel members and gather data. Using this software can yield consumer insight into marketing appeal, promotions effectiveness, product development, and customer service. A single interface can control all panel functions, including frequently used questions, panel invitations, questionnaire design, data gathering and export, and member database. Managers of online surveys and focus groups are common users of this type of software. Market Research software is related to Survey software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top NPS software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of NPS tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: NPS software helps organizations implement campaigns to measure net promoter scores. NPS is a customer and employee satisfaction benchmark calculated using surveys. The final score can be used to gauge loyalty to the brand or organization.

Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Polling software automates feedback solicitation and opinion collection, often in real time, from a wide range of audiences through means as diverse as telephones, mobile devices, and other tools.
